flavor_text: "Centaurs will kill our Aesthir if they can; they've always been enemies. Destroy the horse-people on sight." —Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

name: Altar of Bone
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Yavimaya Gnats
oracle_text:
Flying
{G}: Regenerate Yavimaya Gnats.
flavor_text: "It is our third day of travel on the Yavimaya River, and still these creatures plague us. Davin Lansson, our naturalist, has facetiously labeled them 'gnats,' and the name has stuck." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Woolly Spider
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "We need not fear the forces of the air; I've yet to see a Spider without an appetite." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Woolly Mammoths
oracle_text: Woolly Mammoths has trample as long as you control a snow land.
flavor_text: "Mammoths may be good to ride on, but they're certainly bad to fall off of!" —Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Wild Growth
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.
flavor_text: "Here in Fyndhorn, where Freyalise's power is strongest, the forest has its own opinion." —Laina of the Elvish Council

name: Wiitigo
oracle_text:
Wiitigo enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Wiitigo if it has blocked or been blocked since your last upkeep. Otherwise, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

name: Whiteout
oracle_text:
All creatures lose flying until end of turn.
Sacrifice a snow land: Return Whiteout from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Wall of Pine Needles
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{G}: Regenerate Wall of Pine Needles.
flavor_text: The power of the forest takes a hundred forms. Some are more surprising than others.

name: Venomous Breath
oracle_text: Choose target creature. At this turn's next end of combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked by it this turn.

name: Trailblazer
oracle_text: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "Our Elvish Hunter Taaveti led us swiftly along hidden paths through the dense forest. We caught the Orcs from behind, and completely by surprise." —Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

name: Touch of Vitae
oracle_text:
Until end of turn, target creature gains haste and "{0}: Untap this creature. Activate this ability only once."
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Tinder Wall
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Add {R}{R}.
{R}, Sacrifice Tinder Wall: It deals 2 damage to target creature it's blocking.

name: Thoughtleech
oracle_text: Whenever an Island an opponent controls becomes tapped, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "A resourceful mage has many sources of information. The best one is your foe." —Zur the Enchanter

name: Thermokarst
oracle_text: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "Finally we understand the lesson of our home: loss begets renewal." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Tarpan
oracle_text: When Tarpan dies, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "A good Tarpan will serve you, faithful and true. A bad one will kick you in the head." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Stunted Growth
oracle_text: Target player chooses three cards from their hand and puts them on top of their library in any order.

name: Stampede
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: "We could see the horizon blacken with the great beasts, but it was too late. The icefield offered no immediate safety, but luckily most of us reached a crevasse in which we could take cover." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Snowblind
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-Y. If that creature is attacking, X is the number of snow lands defending player controls. Otherwise, X is the number of snow lands its controller controls. Y is equal to X or to enchanted creature's toughness minus 1, whichever is smaller.

name: Shambling Strider
oracle_text: {R}{G}: Shambling Strider gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Freyalise forbid that any stranger should wander into the Striders' territory.

name: Scaled Wurm
flavor_text: "Flourishing during the Ice Age, these Wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares—they embodied the worst of the Ice Age." —Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

name: Ritual of Subdual
oracle_text:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
If a land is tapped for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of any other type.
flavor_text: "That which does not bend to the will of Freyalise shall surely break." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Rime Dryad
oracle_text: Snow forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow Forest.)
flavor_text: "The Dryads told us to stay, as no new horrors would come when it was so cold. Three of us left anyway. The rest believed their lies, and their skeletons weren't found until the thaw." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Regeneration
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
flavor_text: "Faith in Freyalise has given me the gift, not the curse, of unprecedented longevity." —Laina of the Elvish Council

name: Pyknite
oracle_text: When Pyknite enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text: "Never cross a Pyknite, if you value your scalp." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Pygmy Allosaurus
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: "I don't understand the appeal of keeping these things as pets, unless you want your children eaten." —General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

name: Pale Bears
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: "Daughter, on the day you have killed your Pale Bear, then will I give you your true name." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Nature's Lore
oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "Fyndhorn is our home." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Maddening Wind
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Cumulative upkeep {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Maddening Wind deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor_text: "It is Freyalise, walking on the world." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Lure
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

name: Lhurgoyf
oracle_text: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
flavor_text: "Ach! Hans, run! It's the Lhurgoyf!" —Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

name: Juniper Order Druid
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target land.
flavor_text: "The filthy towns of Kjeldor are no place for anyone to live. Fyndhorn is our home now." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Johtull Wurm
oracle_text: Whenever Johtull Wurm becomes blocked, it gets -2/-1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.
flavor_text: "To bring her down we must be on all sides at once—leave one avenue open and we'll all be dead." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Hurricane
oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
flavor_text: "This was quite possibly the least pleasant occurrence on the entire expedition." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Hot Springs
oracle_text:
Enchant land you control
Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn."

name: Gorilla Pack
oracle_text:
Gorilla Pack can't attack unless defending player controls a Forest.
When you control no Forests, sacrifice Gorilla Pack.
flavor_text: "We learned this at a dear price: once you cross the great river, get through the Yavimaya forest at top speed." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Here in Fyndhorn, the goddess Freyalise is generous to her children." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Fyndhorn Pollen
oracle_text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
All creatures get -1/-0.
{1}{G}: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I breathed deeply, and suddenly I knew not who or where I was." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Fyndhorn Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text: "Living side by side with the Elves for so long leaves me with no doubt that we serve the same goddess." —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Fyndhorn Elder
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}{G}.

name: Fyndhorn Brownie
oracle_text: {2}{G}, {T}: Untap target creature.

name: Freyalise's Winds
oracle_text:
Whenever a permanent becomes tapped, put a wind counter on it.
If a permanent with a wind counter on it would untap during its controller's untap step, remove all wind counters from it instead.

name: Freyalise's Charm
oracle_text:
Whenever an opponent casts a black spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, you draw a card.
{G}{G}: Return Freyalise's Charm to its owner's hand.

oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice a red or white creature: Freyalise Supplicant deals damage to any target equal to half the sacrificed creature's power, rounded down.

oracle_text:
Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

oracle_text:
Enchant land

oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

name: Elder Druid
oracle_text: {3}{G}, {T}: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
flavor_text: "I am older than any Elder Druid before me, and still no child has been born with the Mark to take my place. When will the wheel turn?" —Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

oracle_text:
Enchant land you control
Tap enchanted land: Target blocking creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if enchanted land is untapped.

name: Dire Wolves
oracle_text: Dire Wolves has banding as long as you control a Plains. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor_text: "It's amazing how scared a city kid can get at a dog. Now, of course, I'd cross Terisiare alone, and keep no watch if I had a pack of greys hanging on my flanks as I went." —Oddveig Ulfsson, caravan scout

oracle_text: Whenever Chub Toad blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Blizzard
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only if you control a snow land.
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Creatures with flying don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

name: Balduvian Bears
flavor_text: "They're a hardy bunch, but I'd still bet that they just slept through the worst of the cold times." —Disa the Restless, journal entry

oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.
flavor_text: One Auroch may feed a village, but a herd will flatten it.

oracle_text: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated. Word of Blasting deals damage equal to that Wall's converted mana cost to the Wall's controller.

oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)

name: Tor Giant
flavor_text: "What do you do then? Run. Run very fast. Don't stop until you see the camp—or a bigger Giant." —Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

name: Stonehands

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

oracle_text: Destroy target land.

name: Sabretooth Tiger

flavor_text: "Daughter, it is now your turn to hunt the Tiger, and make a blanket of its fur." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

oracle_text:

flavor_text: "How did I ever let myself get talked into this project?" —Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

{R}{R}, {T}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.
{B}{B}{R}, {T}: Regenerate target black or green creature.
{R}{G}{G}, {T}: Regenerate target black or green creature.
